dmca.title: [EV1-C2521466D] abuse report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Saturday, January 13, 2007 8:32 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2521466D] abuse report

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

          (InterMail vM.6.01.05.04 201-2131-123-105-20051025) with ESMTP

          for <abuse@ev1servers.net>; Thu, 11 Jan 2007 07:58:17 -0500
Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2)
To: abuse@ev1servers.net
Message-Id: <B08A281D-56F8-42A3-9789-4E4289802A57@visualcontent.com>

From: "Lisa Evenson, Visual Content" <lisa@visualcontent.com>
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: abuse report
Subject: abuse report
Date: Thu, 11 Jan 2007 08:09:52 -0500
X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2)
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0
QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
Return-Path: lisa@visualcontent.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Jan 2007 13:10:01.0041 (UTC) FILETIME=[CD0A5C10:01C73581] 

 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
I'm writing to report a copyright abuse problem with a website hosted   
under your services. Instances of copyright abuse with this company   
are located at: 
 
http://www.freemarketingseminars.com/marketing/eight-key-elements-of-
direct-email-marketing-piece.htm 
 
 From the website: 
 
" 
Green Eggs and Spam - Direct Marketing in the Electronic Age   
worldwideaffiliatenetwork.com :: Affiliate marketing. Make money from   
your web site through web advertising. ... single piece of ... key   
elements your ... Direct Marketing in the Electronic Age. by: Lisa   
Evenson. Seventy-eight percent of online shoppers have made a   
purchase after following an email ... 
http://www.worldwideaffiliatenetwork.com/green_eggs_and_spam_-
_direct_marketing_in_the_electronic_age_63.html" 
 
 
I am the author. My articles are not and have never been intended for   
free usage and have clear copyright statements following each on our   
website at www.visualcontent.com/articles.html. Based on the Digital   
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), I'm hoping you whatever is in your   
power to either remove my copyrighted work or remove the site   
altogether. I would greatly appreciate your assistance with this matter. 
 
Thanks so much, 
Lisa Evenson 
 
 
V   i   s   u   a   l   C   o   n   t   e   n   t,  L L P 
http://www.visualcontent.com 
 
Phone: 802.658.6997 
US Mail: PO Box 3217, Burlington, VT 05408 
 
Information contained in this e-mail transmission is privileged,   
confidential and covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy   
Act, 18 U.S.C. Sections 2510-2521. 
 
If you are not the intended recipient, do not read, distribute, or   
reproduce this transmission. 
 
If you have received this e-mail transmission in error, please notify   
us immediately of the error by return email and please delete the   
message from your system. 
 
Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
